name: Riot Reloaded
details:
DistortionRiot Reloaded is the result of countless hours of listening, testing, and
tweaking our original distortion circuit to create a pedal that is amp-like,
aggressive, in your face, and features more gain (30% more than our original
Riot), ideal for players seeking Hi-Gain Rock, Metal, and drop tuning style
tones. Riot Reloaded features an easy to tweak layout which includes
Distortion, Level, Tone, and a three position Voice switch.
CONTROLS
Dist: Adjusts the amount of distortion added to your tone, taking you from a
classic crunch to blistering high gain.
Level: Adjusts the Riot Reloaded’s overall output. Use this control to
minimize the difference between the affected and unaffected signals.
Tone:  Shapes the overall tonal response of the pedal - from smooth and
warm to cutting lead tones. Riot Reloaded’s tone control was modified to
emphasize upper mid-frequencies for a sweeter, more cutting tone, without
sounding harsh or fatiguing.
Voice Switch (three position):
Redesigned to be more apparent offering flexibility, giving you the ability to
fine tune your sound.
Left: Produces a natural, organic tone that responds dynamically to your
instrument’s volume control.
Middle: Puts you into high gain territory with a solid midrange, and a fat
bottom end.  
Right: Produces a classic mid-scooped response, with excellent definition.
Note: The Voice switch may have less effect at lower gain and tone settings.
